tool_input.content:
name: Claude Code Review

on:
  pull_request:
    types: [opened, synchronize, reopened]

jobs:
  review:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      with:
        fetch-depth: 0  # Full history for better context
    
    - name: Get changed files
      id: changed-files
      uses: tj-actions/changed-files@v44
      with:
        files: |
          **/*.py
          **/*.yml
          **/*.yaml
          **/*.json
          **/*.md
    
    - name: Claude Code Review
      if: steps.changed-files.outputs.any_changed == 'true'
      env:
        ANTHROPIC_API_KEY: ${{ secrets.ANTHROPIC_API_KEY }}
        PR_NUMBER: ${{ github.event.pull_request.number }}
        GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
      run: |
        # This is a placeholder for Claude Code review integration
        # In practice, this would:
        # 1. Analyze the changed files
        # 2. Send them to Claude for review
        # 3. Post comments on the PR
        
        echo "Changed files for review:"
        echo "${{ steps.changed-files.outputs.all_changed_files }}"
        
        # For now, just run basic checks
        if [[ -n $(echo "${{ steps.changed-files.outputs.all_changed_files }}" | grep "\.py$") ]]; then
          echo "Python files changed - would request Claude review"
        fi

name: Claude Code Review

on:
  pull_request:
    types: [opened, synchronize, reopened]

jobs:
  review:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      with:
        fetch-depth: 0  # Full history for better context
    
    - name: Get changed files
      id: changed-files
      uses: tj-actions/changed-files@v44
      with:
        files: |
          **/*.py
          **/*.yml
          **/*.yaml
          **/*.json
          **/*.md
    
    - name: Claude Code Review
      if: steps.changed-files.outputs.any_changed == 'true'
      env:
        ANTHROPIC_API_KEY: ${{ secrets.ANTHROPIC_API_KEY }}
        PR_NUMBER: ${{ github.event.pull_request.number }}
        GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
      run: |
        # This is a placeholder for Claude Code review integration
        # In practice, this would:
        # 1. Analyze the changed files
        # 2. Send them to Claude for review
        # 3. Post comments on the PR
        
        echo "Changed files for review:"
        echo "${{ steps.changed-files.outputs.all_changed_files }}"
        
        # For now, just run basic checks
        if [[ -n $(echo "${{ steps.changed-files.outputs.all_changed_files }}" | grep "\.py$") ]]; then
          echo "Python files changed - would request Claude review"
        fi
